title: Idea for LoL Anniversary
body: For the anniversary of League of Legends, I think Rito should bring back an old patch for a few days in a game mode, such as a patch in Beta, S1 or S2. This would allow the community to enjoy a change up, allow the community to see the development of LoL and provide enjoyment (and frustration) with the readdition of op champs  {{item:3089}} {{champion:11}}  or {{item:3068}} {{champion:28}}

replies.body:
This would be a huge patch and curse upon all those who have shit internet.
It would probably take me 3 days to download.
Ap yi, fuck that was grate. they had some cool stuff back in the day
